alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Ransom; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:30AM CDT until June 14 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ransom County in southeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... Southern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Sargent County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 530 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Lamoure, or 48 miles south of Valley City, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Fort Ransom, Little Yellowstone, Kathryn, Nome, Lucca, Fingal and Oriska. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 299 and 304. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
